name: Greedy Trolley
description:
While playing the “Greedy Trolley”, you collect the rubies in a certain period of time and bring them to the finish line. But, of course, everything won't be so easy. On your way you’ll face a lot of dangers.

Features:
1) nice "pixel art" graphics;
2) best sounds and music;
3) interesting and tricky game levels.

Features of gameplay:
1) collection of level rubies will be an alternative to your health points;
2) performing of exciting tricks while passing the level;
3) dangerous obstacles (traps, enemies and acid puddles);
4) special items that will push your trolley or make you go faster.

"Greedy Trolley" - this is the most enjoyable and interesting game that you have ever been waiting for!
